itemDetails.fan_favorite: A fan favorite from Counter-Strike Source, the Silenced USP Pistol has a detachable silencer that gives shots less recoil and noise.

priceHistory.title: Price history
priceHistory.chart_placeholder: Price chart will be displayed here

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: The USP-S (Universelle Selbstladepistole-Schalld√§mpfer, German for "Universal Self-loading Pistol Silencer") is a silenced CT-exclusive pistol that was added in the update that ported Counter-Strike: Global Offensive to the Source 2 engine.

rarity.title: Rarity
rarity.content: The Royal Blue is one of the older skin designs in the game, featuring a simple blue slide with a black grip and barrel. Its industrial grade rarity makes it affordable and accessible for most players.

history.title: History
history.content: This skin was introduced in the original Arms Deal update on August 14, 2013. It quickly became a favorite for players looking for a clean, simple design for their USP-S without breaking the bank.

popularity.title: Popularity
popularity.content: Despite its simple design, the USP-S Royal Blue maintains steady popularity due to its clean look and affordability. It's often chosen by players who prefer minimalist designs over flashier, more expensive alternatives.
